description: Replacement windows to east and south elevations; and hardstanding to front garden (retrospective application)
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out and retained in accordance with drawing title number(s) Photographs received on 31 July 2015; Floorplan of Block Paved Area, Crossover (existing) for 41 Garden Close, Northolt, Middlesex UB5 5ND; Window drawing of 41 Garden Close, Northolt UB5 5ND; Manufacturing details 2800 decorative; OS Map Location Plan and Block Plan; East Side Facing Elevation of 41 and 43 Garden Close UB5; Front South Facing Elevation showing window prior and following replacement #41 and 43 Garden Close UB5;  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning.
